title: Salesforce is getting into bed with WhatsApp
description: Salesforce has partnered with Meta to help customers build closer relationships with customers.

title: iPhone 15 Pro could get the fastest connection possible
description: A leak says Apple will go USB-C for the iPhone 15, with the Pro and Ultra phones getting a powerful Thunderbolt 4 port for much faster data transfer.

title: This Chromebook lets you do your own memory and storage upgrades
description: Framework's latest offering allows you to upgrade the RAM and offers the full ChromeOS experience.

title: Seagate and Western Digital predict a grim future for storage media sales
description: The digital media storage industry is weathering several storms at once.

title: OnePlus 11 Pro leak leaves us with more questions than enthusiasm
description: A new leak suggests the OnePlus 11 Pro will use even better Qualcomm processors and upgrade the telephoto camera from the OnePlus 10 Pro. Not all specs are an improvement, though.

title: Yet another major crypto firm has been hacked
description: Wintermute sees roughly $160 million in various tokens stolen, but the company is still solvent.

title: 2K Games helpdesk hacked to spread malware to players
description: Gaming giant warns players not to open any support emails while it investigates.

title: Google wants to help remove your personal details from its search results
description: New feature for Google Android app helps users remove PII easily.

title: Forget HomePod 2, all AirPlay speakers could soon get full Apple TV 4K support
description: Right now, only HomePods can be set as default speakers for Apple TV 4K, but according to beta code found in iOS 16.1, it's a trick any AirPlay 2 speaker might soon be able to pull off.

title: Even horse racing isn't safe from ransomware now
description: Ransomware attack hits the New York Racing Association, with some employee data leaked.

title: Wix now has its own keyword search tool
description: Wix users can leverage Semrush’s SEO tools and keyword database to increase their visibility in search results.

title: Iranian authorities restrict Instagram as last effort to silence protesters
description: People in Iran need to use a VPN to access one of the last social media platforms available across the country.

title: iPad Crayon maker slips, possibly confirms new Apple iPad Pros are coming
